title: S8E12 – "Deadly Dealings" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you seven spine-chilling tales from author Kyle Harrison, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about hellish highways, horrific hoarders, mystic mirrors, weird websites, alarming apartments, terrifying tunnels, and bloodcurdling bridges.

                     
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
